entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as one of the top contenders in the tournament. He is described as being tied with Mr. Cedric Diggory for first place, with eighty-five points each.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: Mr. Cedric Diggory is mentioned as one of the top contenders in the tournament. He is described as being tied with Harry Potter for first place, with eighty-five points each.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as being in second place, with eighty points.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Miss Fleur Delacour is mentioned as being in third place.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the top contenders in the tournament. He is described as waving up at his friends and family in the stands.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned as the person who gives the signal for Harry and Cedric to enter the maze.

entities.name: hogwarts school
entities.description: Hogwarts School is mentioned as the institution that Mr. Cedric Diggory and Harry Potter attend.

entities.name: durmstrang institute
entities.description: Durmstrang Institute is mentioned as the institution that Viktor Krum attends.

entities.name: beauxbatons academy
entities.description: Beauxbatons Academy is mentioned as the institution that Miss Fleur Delacour attends.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is mentioned as a location where birds are seen fluttering into the darkening sky.

entities.name: maze
entities.description: The maze is mentioned as the location where Harry and Cedric enter to compete in the tournament.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Cedric Diggory are tied for first place, with eighty-five points each.
Viktor Krum is behind Harry Potter in the standings, with eighty points.
Fleur Delacour is behind Viktor Krum in the standings.
Bagman gives the signal for Harry Potter to enter the maze.
Bagman also gives the signal for Cedric Diggory to enter the maze.
